hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Minuet of Forest#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Deku Stick#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Silver Rupee Top Left

LH (Southwest Corner).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

ToT (Right).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #Dampé's Hut#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #7# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Zora Shop#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.
